item.title: [PI] cannot do a command while trading!
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

before this
f (playerCommand.startsWith("/") && playerCommand.length() > 1) {
if (c.clanId >= 0) {
playerCommand = playerCommand.substring(1);
Server.clanChat.playerMessageToClan(c, playerCommand);
} else {
if (c.clanId != -1) {
c.clanId = -1;
}
c.sendMessage(“You are not in a clan.”);
}
}
add your code…

item.title: [PI] cannot do a command while trading!
item.dc:creator: @IamGretar IamGretar
item.description:
@IamGretar wrote:

Let’s say im in a trade.
And i do ::players or any kind of command that opens up an interface. That leaves the other player still in the trade. any ideas of howi can make it so you cannot use any kind of command while trading?

I know i can go through all the command list and do
if(c.inTrade) {
return;
}

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] cannot do a command while trading!
